external_games.name: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas

name: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
summary: Bedrock is ready to rumble! Fred, Wilma, and all their friends are ready to put their feet to the floor and burn it up all the way from Bedrock to Rock Vegas in the infamous "Boulderball Run", a hilarious race all across the madcap, crazy world of the Flintstones! Ready steady YABBA DABBA DOO!
